context: I began my UI/UX journey with Figma, and over time I have managed to memorize the shortcuts to make designing as efficient as possible. I have been able to practice my use of the pen tool through various projects, as well as the prototyping feature. The recent FigJam update is great for team work.
I have had very minimal experience with AdobeXD. All of my knowledge was self taught through trial and error. I have found it easy to pick up given my knowledge of Figma.
